item.title: Study Chronicle - Week 2 (June 2‚Äì8)
item.description:
üìù Week 2: The Exam Session Begins

The exam session has officially started! The first exam was Informatics. I got a question on logic circuits and basic Python programming. It was challenging, but prior experience from practicals really helped.

I also passed the English language credit ‚Äî thanks to prepared presentations, everything went smoothly. The teacher even praised my pronunciation and structure.

Finally, I‚Äôm starting to feel how all the learning is coming together into a cohesive whole.
